name: Music In The Air
description:
Music In The Air is an interactive sound toy for children aged 2 to 5 years old. It features bright engaging graphics, professionally produced and mastered sounds and interactive elements.

Fly your air balloon around the farm land and hills, say hello to the cow and get caught up in the gusts of a wind turbine. Shake your balloon to rattle it, and move it fast to hear them scream with joy.

Musical notes fill the air playing delightful music box style notes when you touch them with your air balloon. Choose from 3 unique designs for your balloon and hear audio cues for the colours chosen.

Suitable for mouse and touch devices
